CONSTANCE HYMAN

Constance Hyman

After many years as a wife and stay at home mother, I discovered a love for programming. The opportunity to collaborate and work with other software engineers, helping to achieve the goals and mission of your company is my primary objective. I’m looking forward to a career in a dynamic and challenging field and am excited to leverage my personal experience and soft skills to better achieve both personal and professional growth, while delivering value in a Software Engineering position.

I have experience with Ruby, Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, React, HTML and CSS. I have deployed to Heroku and Netlify. I have built my own API’s with Ruby, and integrated third-party API’s. I’m well versed in REST principles. I have used GitLab for CI/CD, and AWS S3 on a project for experience and learning, and familiarized myself with Python and Golang. Additionally, I contribute to an open source project, Ruby For Good - Mutual Aid. I’m happy to learn new programming languages to suit current and future company needs. I am primarily seeking a remote position.

Self taught for a few years, I decided to enroll in Flatiron's Online, Self-Paced, Full Stack Software Engineering Program. Since completing the curriculum in December, 2020, I have been working on personal projects, including a Swift application.
